scenario_text.value:
Looks like the enemies have toughened up
their guard.

Yeah, but thanks to those Holy Beast
Protections, we’re blowing right through ’em!

I bet even the Master’s no match for us now!
Let’s pick up the pace!

Hey, don’t go getting carried away. We’re up
against the so-called ruler of this world.

We gotta be super careful. I’m not about to
lose everything because we got too reckless.

Oh, come on, Ryo. After all we’ve been
through, are you still such a coward?
It’s not even about that!

(I could go either way on this one. Should we
move cautiously or be more daring?)
(Hmm, what to do here?)
We should take care.
Pick up the pace.
Stop arguing.
We should take care.

I’m with Ryo. We’re in for a tough fight, so
we should take every precaution.
I guess... If you say so, Takuma.

You really don’t care about what I say at
all, do you?
Pick up the pace.

Minoru’s got the right idea. Why don’t we
pick up the pace?
What? Are you serious?

We’re fighting a lot, and it’s dragging
things out. I don’t want to waste time.

Yeah, sorry. I guess you’ve got a point. We
should move quickly while we can.
Stop arguing.

I can see where you’re both coming from on
this, but we shouldn’t be arguing right now.
Oh. Yeah, you’re right.
Sorry.
Forget it. Let’s just keep moving.
